recipe.name: French Onion Soup
recipe.ingredients: 907 grams (2 pounds) onions 1 teaspoon salt 57 grams (4 tablespoons) butter 4 cups beef stock 2 tablespoons Marsala wine 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce 1/2 teaspoon dry thyme 1/4 teaspoon ground sage 1 bay leaf Toast or crostini, for serving Swiss cheese, for serving

step.describe: Add the onion to the mixing bowl.

Add the salt and butter.
After program stop, Scrape down the bowl. And repeat this step 4 times by pressing "cook again".
The onions should be cooked through, somewhat soft, and with no sharp flavor, but not browned. Continue cooking, if needed.
Add the beef stock, Marsala, Worcestershire sauce, thyme, sage, and bay leaf.
Serve in ovenproof bowls. Top with a slice of toasted bread, cut to fit the bowl. Add the cheese to the top of the bread and place the bowls under a broiler to melt the cheese. Serve hot.
